languages.text: Этот клинок был освящен проповедником по имени Гималиск. Грубый стражник замахнулся им на слугу Императора, разгоняя толпу, но тут же обрел прозрение веры, пал на колени и в слезах умолял пророка о прощении. Проповедник помиловал стражника и вынул меч из его длани, пообещав, что лезвие его будет разить лишь врагов веры.

This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.
languages.original_text: Этот клинок был освящен проповедником по имени Гималиск. Грубый стражник замахнулся им на слугу Императора, разгоняя толпу, но тут же обрел прозрение веры, пал на колени и в слезах умолял пророка о прощении. Проповедник помиловал стражника и вынул меч из его длани, пообещав, что лезвие его будет разить лишь врагов веры.

traits.locale_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher known as the Pure-Voiced Prophet. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly guardsman swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to immediately receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the guardsman and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

The prophet was merciful to the guardsman and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

The prophet was merciful to the guardsman and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

languages.text: Esta cuchilla fue bendecida por un predicador llamado Himalisk. Mientras dispersaba una muchedumbre, un guardia carente de modales la blandió contra el sirviente del Emperador, pero tuvo una epifanía, cayó de rodillas y suplicó el perdón del profeta. Este, a su vez, fue misericordioso y tomó el arma de su mano, prometiendo que desde ese momento solo atacaría a los enemigos de la fe.
languages.original_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

traits.locale_text: Esta cuchilla fue bendecida por un predicador llamado Himalisk. Mientras dispersaba una muchedumbre, un guardia carente de modales la blandió contra el sirviente del Emperador, pero tuvo una epifanía, cayó de rodillas y suplicó el perdón del profeta. Este, a su vez, fue misericordioso y tomó el arma de su mano, prometiendo que desde ese momento solo atacaría a los enemigos de la fe.

languages.text: Cette lame a reçu la bénédiction d'un prêcheur nommé Himalisk. Un garde indélicat chargé de disperser la foule levait son arme sur le serviteur de l'Empereur quand il reçut une révélation, tomba à genoux et supplia, en larmes, que le prophète lui pardonne son geste. Le prophète se montra indulgent et lui prit l'épée des mains, tout en faisant le serment qu'elle ne frapperait plus jamais que les ennemis de la foi.
languages.original_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

traits.locale_text: Cette lame a reçu la bénédiction d'un prêcheur nommé Himalisk. Un garde indélicat chargé de disperser la foule levait son arme sur le serviteur de l'Empereur quand il reçut une révélation, tomba à genoux et supplia, en larmes, que le prophète lui pardonne son geste. Le prophète se montra indulgent et lui prit l'épée des mains, tout en faisant le serment qu'elle ne frapperait plus jamais que les ennemis de la foi.

languages.text: 布道士希玛利斯克赐福的利刃。在某次驱散人群的时候，一名鲁莽的卫兵打算朝帝皇的仆人举起武器，但却突然福至心灵，扑倒在地，含泪恳请先知的宽恕。先知慈悯地接过他手中的利刃，应允它从此往后只会挥向信仰的敌人。
languages.original_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

traits.locale_text: 布道士希玛利斯克赐福的利刃。在某次驱散人群的时候，一名鲁莽的卫兵打算朝帝皇的仆人举起武器，但却突然福至心灵，扑倒在地，含泪恳请先知的宽恕。先知慈悯地接过他手中的利刃，应允它从此往后只会挥向信仰的敌人。

languages.text: ヒマリスクという名のプリーチャーによって祝福されし刃。群衆を退散させている最中、無作法な監視員が皇帝のしもべに向かってこの剣を振りかざした。しかし監視員は信仰の啓示を受け、ひざまずいて、涙ながらに預言者の許しを請うばかりだった。預言者は監視員に慈悲を与え、彼の手から剣を取り上げ、今後は信仰の敵にのみ剣を向けると約束した。
languages.original_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

traits.locale_text: ヒマリスクという名のプリーチャーによって祝福されし刃。群衆を退散させている最中、無作法な監視員が皇帝のしもべに向かってこの剣を振りかざした。しかし監視員は信仰の啓示を受け、ひざまずいて、涙ながらに預言者の許しを請うばかりだった。預言者は監視員に慈悲を与え、彼の手から剣を取り上げ、今後は信仰の敵にのみ剣を向けると約束した。

languages.text: Diese Klinge wurde von einem Prediger namens Himalisk gesegnet. Bei der Auflösung einer Menschenmasse attackierte ein wildgewordener Wächter den Diener des Imperators damit, als er plötzlich eine Erleuchtung des Glaubens erlebte, auf die Knie fiel und den Propheten unter Tränen um Vergebung anflehte. Der Prophet hatte Gnade mit dem Wächter, nahm ihm das Schwert aus der Hand und versprach, dass es fortan nur noch Feinde des Glaubens angreifen würde.
languages.original_text: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.
